original_text: Even now your people are still proud. They have not respected my authority. They have not obeyed the laws and commands that I gave to you and to your ancestors.”
korean_text: 그들이 오늘까지 겸손하지 아니하며 두려워하지도 아니하고 내가 너희와 너희 조상들 앞에 세운 나의 율법과 나의 법규를 지켜 행하지 아니하느니라

sentences.original_text: Even now your people are still proud.
They have not respected my authority.
They have not obeyed the laws
and commands that I gave to you
